about_the_game:
This is a game about a vempire to against the adventurers.
1. You can use your skills to kill enemies and convert them to your servants to help fight, which is the only way for you to produce combat units.
2. Servants killing enemies will evolve into higher-level units, and the small dot in the middle of the card represents the number of enemies that need to be killed for evolution.
3. Killing enemies has a chance to drop items into the item compartment in the bottom right corner, items can assist in combat.
4. Killing enemies will drop souls, and you can upgrade skills on the talent interface after the battle is over with these souls.
5. When the player's health becomes zero, the battle fails.
6. There will be a total of three heroes and a large number of adventurers coming to attack. Defeating all enemies will lead to victory.

short_description: This is a roguelike game with card battles as its core. Players need to play as a vampire ancestor to resist the attacks of a large number of adventurers and defeat three great heroes to achieve ultimate victory.
